description: Join Swapil to learn about PowerBI and get an introduction to Dax Coding.
title: Data Analytics Workshop 3: PowerBI

description: Make predictions on the game with data analytics, and see if they come true!
title: Champions League Watch Party
body:
Scan the QR code or go to the posted forms link to submit your predictions for Liverpool versus Real Madrid.

Students will win based on accuracy of their predictions, as well as their use of UEFA Champions League Statistics to justify their predictions.

Come watch the game with us in IC334 and see if they come true!

description: ECLIPSE is an all-day multidisciplinary case competition catered for undergraduates and organized by student management groups.
title: ECLIPSE Case Competition 2024
body:
The 3rd annual edition of ECLIPSE has returned! Learn more about the competition and register over at [https://www.eclipsecompetition.ca/](https://www.eclipsecompetition.ca/)

Four management student organizations at the University of Toronto have partnered together to bring forth a multidisciplinary case competition for all undergraduate students in Ontario. 

An all-day event that includes:

- Speaker series - get business insights from experienced professionals!

- Networking session - build connections with industry managers!

- Multidisciplinary cases - Solve unique business cases and leave the first impression on potential employers!

- Personal swag bags - Sent to all participants & includes discounts, merchandise, and more.

description: Registration now open. Get ready to explore the world of finance and tech at Wealthsimple's Toronto office.
title: MTA x Wealthsimple
location: 80 Spadina Ave. 4th Floor, Toronto, ON M5V 2J4
body:
Registration open at [https://forms.gle/473QpMjdPyExgxjZ6](https://forms.gle/473QpMjdPyExgxjZ6)

Join us for the MTA x Wealthsimple collaboration event. Get ready to explore the world of finance and tech at the heart of it all -- with the Wealthsimple Toronto office! 

This event will include a panel of speakers, information session, office tour, and networking! Please complete the form above to complete registration for the event. If you have any questions or concerns, you can reach out to us over Instagram (@mtautsc) or email (mtecha.utsc@gmail.com).  



**(Image credit: Photo by Zia Syed on Unsplash)
